item.title: Z 世代问：有收入 ETF，为什么还要工作？
item.description:
在本周的Trillions节目中，我们将讨论一些年轻投资者认为的致富捷径，以及他们应该警惕的原因。【原文：

On this week’s episode of Trillions, we discuss what some young investors think is a shortcut to wealth, and why they should be wary.

】

item.title: 阿米斯正在权衡多达七份网络公司股权收购要约
item.description: 网络安全初创公司 Armis 的高层管理人员表示，该公司正在权衡大约六到七家投资者的入股意向。【原文：The cybersecurity startup Armis is weighing around six to seven offers from investors for a stake in the company, its top executive said.】

item.title: 交易员通过华纳兄弟的投注瞬间中得 500 万美元大奖
item.description: 就在媒体报道派拉蒙天舞公司（Paramount Skydance Corp.）准备收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery Inc.【原文：An investor is up about $5 million after taking a bullish options position in Warner Bros Discovery Inc. just hours before a media report that Paramount Skydance Corp. is preparing to buy a majority stake in the movie studio owner.】

item.title: Arctos 称私募股权投资公司数量达到峰值，面临僵尸风险
item.description: Arctos Partners 公司联合创始人兼管理合伙人伊恩-查尔斯（Ian Charles）表示，今年将有创纪录数量的私募股权投资公司变成所谓的僵尸基金，因为它们难以吸引到新的投资者现金。【原文：A record number of private equity firms will turn into so-called zombie funds this year, as they struggle to reel in new investor cash, according to Ian Charles, co-founder and managing partner at Arctos Partners.】

item.title: 特朗普请求法院暂停允许库克留任美联储的命令
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统要求联邦上诉法院立即暂停下级法院阻止他罢免美联储理事丽莎-库克的裁决，这是美国政府希望将此案快速提交美国最高法院的最新迹象。【原文：President Donald Trump asked a federal appeals court to immediately pause a lower court decision blocking his ouster of Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, the latest sign that the administration wants to put the case on a fast track to the US Supreme Court.】

item.title: 纽蒙特退出加拿大上市显示交易所竞争激烈
item.description: 高歌猛进的金矿开采商纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）今年的股价上涨了一倍多，该公司将在本月底前将其股票从加拿大证券交易所撤出，成为本周第二家这样做的公司。【原文：High-flying gold miner Newmont Corp., whose shares have more than doubled this year, will pull its stock off the Canadian stock exchange by the end of the month, making it the second company this week to do so.】

item.title: 据说温克艾沃斯双胞胎的双子座公司将首次公开募股规模限制在 4.25 亿美元以内
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，双子座空间站公司（Gemini Space Station Inc.【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc. is telling investors it expects to cap the base size of its initial public offering at $425 million ahead of pricing later on Thursday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇就劳动力市场问题与中央银行意见相左
item.description: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）反驳了央行关于其政府的一些政策正在损害劳动力市场的评估，这是对货币当局的罕见批评。【原文：Chile President Gabriel Boric pushed back against the central bank’s assessment that some of his administration’s policies are hurting the labor market, marking a rare critique of the monetary authority.】

item.title: 贝莱德在比特币基金取得突破后寻求将 ETF 代币化
item.description: 贝莱德公司正在探索如何对华尔街最大的投资产品之一进行数字化改造。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is exploring how to give one of Wall Street’s biggest investment products a digital makeover.】

item.title: 墨西哥沉睡的股市因最新上市计划而骚动起来
item.description: 墨西哥股市正呈现出生机勃勃的迹象，投资者的热情再度高涨，推动了创纪录的涨势，公司再次寻求上市。【原文：Mexico’s stock market is showing signs of life, with companies again looking to list shares amid renewed investor appetite that’s fueled a record-breaking rally.】

item.title: 准备好迎接美联储一个又一个充满争议的决定吧
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 即使关税增加，美国赤字仍创历史第三高纪录
item.description: 美国 8 月份的关税收入创下了新的月度纪录，反映了唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税上调政策，但联邦政府的财政赤字仍是本财年迄今为止的第三大赤字。【原文：US tariff revenue hit a new monthly record in August, reflecting President Donald Trump’s tariff hikes, though that still left the federal government with the third-biggest deficit on record so far this fiscal year.】

item.title: 短视频片段可能蚕食播客的真正受众
item.description:
社交媒体上无处不在、热闹非凡的视频在推动受众观看完整播客剧集方面的效果如何？【原文：

How effective are ubiquitous, buzzy videos on social media at driving audiences to full-length podcast episodes?

】

item.title: Partners Capital 的 Bewley 关注私人信贷领域日益严重的困境
item.description: Partners Capital 正在关注价值 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场上出现的大量不良贷款机会，认为过去几年贷款标准的降低为一些公司的债务重组创造了机会。【原文：Partners Capital is eyeing a surge of distressed opportunities within the $1.7 trillion private credit market, arguing that a weakening of lending standards over the past several years is creating chances to rework some companies’ debt loads.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校在高收益反弹中卷土重来
item.description: 芝加哥的垃圾级公立学区在中断两年后重返市政债券市场，其出售正值州和地方债务的高收益市场转好之际。【原文：Chicago’s junk-rated public school district is returning to the municipal bond market after a two-year hiatus, with its sale coming right as the high-yield market for state and local debt turns positive.】

item.title: 优步因乘客残疾歧视遭司法部起诉
item.description: 优步科技公司被美国司法部起诉，指控这家共享出行巨头歧视身体残疾人士，违反了联邦法律。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. was sued by the US Justice Department over claims that the ride-sharing giant discriminates against people with physical disabilities in violation of federal law.】

item.title: Blackstone 接近 Justrite 8 亿美元私人信贷交易
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，在安全产品制造商 Justrite Safety Group 撤回杠杆贷款出售后，Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to provide more than $800 million in private credit financing for Justrite Safety Group after the safety-products maker withdrew a leveraged loan sale, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Pimco 正退出带来巨大收益的债券交易
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co.’s Daniel Ivascyn is pulling back from one of the bond market’s hottest trades.】

item.title: 芬兰将考虑最快于今年对快递公司 Posti 进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，芬兰正在考虑尽快于今年在赫尔辛基证券交易所首次公开发行 Posti Group Oyj，从而拉开芬兰邮政服务私有化进程的序幕。【原文：Finland is considering an initial public offering of Posti Group Oyj on the Helsinki stock exchange as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter, kicking off a long-touted privatization of the country’s postal service.】

item.title: 英美资源集团与泰克集团的交易取决于陷入困境的智利铜矿
item.description: 采矿业最雄心勃勃的组合之一的核心是一项计划，即修复位于智利阿塔卡马沙漠高处的泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）问题重重的铜矿，并最终将其与英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）皇冠上一颗璀璨的明珠--邻近的大型铜矿整合在一起。【原文：At the heart of one of the mining industry’s most ambitious combinations is a plan to fix a problematic Teck Resources Ltd. copper mine high in Chile’s Atacama desert, and ultimately to integrate it with a vast neighboring operation that has long been a jewel in Anglo American Plc’s crown.】

item.title: 股价暴跌后，Infosys 将回购 20 亿美元股票
item.description: 印度软件服务巨头 Infosys Ltd. 将回购价值高达 1,800 亿印度卢比（约合 20 亿美元）的股票，以在股价下跌之际向投资者返还现金。【原文：Indian software services giant Infosys Ltd. will buy back as much as 180 billion Indian rupees ($2 billion) worth of shares in an effort to return cash to investors amid a stock-price decline.】

item.title: 凯雷计划成立 40 多亿美元的新基金，从 PE 股权中释放现金
item.description: 凯雷投资集团公司（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is readying a new fund to give cash-strapped investors a way to unlock money from their private equity investments, less than a year after raising more than $4 billion for such financing plays.】

item.title: 欧洲央行倾向于维持利率不变，除非出现经济冲击
item.description: 据熟悉欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者想法的人士透露，尽管新的经济预测显示未来两年的通胀率将偏低，但他们相信无需进一步降息就能实现 2% 的通胀率。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers are convinced that no further interest-rate cuts are needed to deliver 2% inflation, despite new economic projections pointing to an undershoot over the next two years, according to people familiar with their thinking.】

item.title: 自由之声 "电影制片厂股票首次亮相，涨幅达 70
item.description: 天使工作室公司（Angel Studios Inc. 是《自由之声》等宗教电影的独立制片厂）在完成与一家特殊目的收购公司的合并后，首日交易涨幅高达 70%。【原文：Angel Studios Inc., the independent studio behind religious films such as the Sound of Freedom, rose as much as 70% in initial trading after completing its merger with a special purpose acquisition company.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所将取代 Teleperformance 成为 CAC 40 指数的基准指数
item.description: 巴黎证券交易所运营商表示，泛欧交易所将取代 Teleperformance SE 在法国蓝筹股 CAC 40 指数中的位置，这反映了两家公司命运的不同。【原文：Euronext NV will replace Teleperformance SE on France’s blue-chip CAC 40 index, the Paris bourse operator said, reflecting the diverging fortunes of the two companies.】

item.title: 首次公开募股募集 2.85 亿美元后，LB 制药公司股价大涨 27
item.description: 生物技术公司 LB Pharmaceuticals Inc. 在扩大首次公开募股规模筹集 2.85 亿美元后，股价首日开盘上涨 27%。【原文：LB Pharmaceuticals Inc. shares opened 27% higher in their trading debut after the biotech raised $285 million in an upsized initial public offering.】

item.title: 第二季度美国家庭净资产因股市反弹而回升
item.description: 随着股票价格攀升至新高，美国家庭净资产在第二季度出现反弹。【原文：US household net worth rebounded in the second quarter as stock prices climbed to a fresh high.】

item.title: 抵押贷款利率创一年来最大降幅，刺激再融资热潮
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率创下一年来最大降幅，推动了希望省钱的房主对再融资的需求激增。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US fell by the most in a year, fueling a surge in refinancing demand from homeowners looking to save money.】

item.title: 房地美美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 6.35
item.description: 房地美数据显示，截至 9 月 11 日的一周，30 年期固定抵押贷款利率从 6.5% 降至 6.35%。15 年期利率平均为 5.50%，低于一周前的 5.60%："房地美首席经济学家萨姆-卡特（Sam Khater）说："30 年期固定利率抵押贷款比上周下降了 15 个基点，这是过去一年中最大的单周降幅。【原文：The 30-year fixed mortgage rate for week ending Sept. 11 fell to 6.35% from 6.5%, Freddie Mac data show. 15-year rate avg 5.50%, down from 5.60% a week earlierFrom the report: "The 30-year fixed-rate mortgage fell 15 basis points from last week, the largest weekly drop in the past year,” said Sam Khater, Freddie Mac’s Chief Economist."Mortgage rates are headed in the right direction and homebuyers have noticed, as purchase applications reached the highest year-over-year growth rate in more than】

item.title: 创始人重新加入董事会，Meme-Darling Opendoor 股价飙升
item.description: Opendoor Technologies Inc.宣布联合创始人重返董事会和新任首席执行官后，周四股价大涨69%。【原文：Opendoor Technologies Inc. shares surged by as much as 69% Thursday after announcing the return of its co-founders to the board and a new chief executive officer.】
